burn(address,uint16,uint8,(uint144,uint1.details: This function is called when a user burns APE.It splits the collateral amount between the minter, stakers and POL and updates the total supply and balances.

mint(address,uint16,uint8,(uint144,uint1.details: This function is called when a user mints APE.It splits the collateral amount between the minter, stakers and POL and updates the total supply and balances.
